rows.title: Zalo Engagement & Lifecycle Automation System
rows.description: Developed a comprehensive automation system using n8n, Docker, Notion, Zalo, and Grok AI. Streamlined customer data synchronization, automated personalized Zalo renewal reminders, and generated real-time admin reports. Architected and deployed using Docker and n8n, integrated Grok AI and Zalo API for personalized messaging.

rows.title: Hand Draw Object Detect — AI Drawing Recognition Platform
rows.description: A web-based demo application that detects and classifies hand-drawn digits in real time. Created an interactive drawing canvas with HTML, CSS, and jQuery. Developed a Flask backend with CNN model using TensorFlow/Keras on MNIST dataset. Implemented image preprocessing with OpenCV and NumPy for accurate predictions.
